Body:
I develop an application on my Raspberry Pi 3,

Sometimes, I can't build my APK because the size of folder :

data/misc/crash-reporter/crash" increase to 2.2GB.

whenever my application crash
column10:
sometimes I'm obliged to empty the folder.

How to prevent data from accumulating in the "crash" fodler ? 

rpi3:/ # cd data/misc/crash_reporter/crash	rpi3:/data/misc/crash_reporter/crash # ls	supplied_hci_thread.20171110.160745.406.core      supplied_hci_thread.20171110.160940.406.meta   supplied_hci_thread.20171110.162458.410.core  supplied_hci_thread.20171110.165237.410.fail.log	supplied_hci_thread.20171110.160940.406.fail.log  supplied_hci_thread.20171110.162202.2116.core  supplied_hci_thread.20171110.165025.410.core  supplied_hci_thread.20171110.165237.410.meta		rpi3:/data/misc/crash_reporter # du -sh *	2.2G    crash	4.0K    crash_sender	4.0K    guid	4.0K    lock	12K     log	4.0K    run	8.0K    spool	324K    tmp

Many thanks!

"

Body: Have you filed a bug in the [Android issue tracker](https://issuetracker.google.com/issues?q=componentid:192720%2B)?
I will do it, it's true that Android Thing is an OS not yet very stable
